title: Change application title to Family Journey

requirements.summary: Update the HTML document title to 'Family Journey'
acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab displays 'Family Journey' as the page title
The title tag in index.html contains 'Family Journey'

file_operations.description: Change the <title> tag content from 'Family Blog' to 'Family Journey' to update the browser tab title

requirements.summary: Update the main header to display 'Family Journey'
acceptanceCriteria: The main application header visibly shows 'Family Journey' to users
The title change is consistent across all pages using the Layout component

file_operations.description: Update any header text or title displayed in the Layout component to show 'Family Journey' instead of the existing title, ensuring the change appears on all pages that use this layout wrapper
